title: Sunrise: awakening = Tjintu-pakani
creator_credit: Andre Reese and Australia Council. Aboriginal Arts Board
brief_description: Depicts a six-week long Aboriginal theatre workshop at the Black Theatre Arts and Culture Centre, Redfern, Sydney that culminates in a first performance for most of the participants. Highlights the dignity and growing self-image of those who participated. Suitable for secondary level. Performers include Andrew Jackomos.
